title: Review: Synology’s RT6600ax router pairs exceptional Wi-Fi 6 with robust NAS features
content:
Late last year, Synology announced the new RT6600ax Wi-Fi 6 router. Serving as the modern update to its previous combination router and NAS, this new offering finally began shipping this week. With Wi-Fi 6 support out of the box, we’re seeing just what Synology’s usual NAS expertise brings to the table for its latest networking upgrade.

more…

The post Review: Synology’s RT6600ax router pairs exceptional Wi-Fi 6 with robust NAS features appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Synology RT6600ax just launched and we're taking a hands-on look at how its Wi-Fi 6 support complements built-in NAS features and more.
